About Me

I'm a junior front-end developer passionate about creating captivating websites. With a solid grasp of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I skillfully bring design concepts to life. Proficient in PHP and Content Management Systems, I tackle diverse projects, blending creativity with technical expertise. Specializing in web development and maintenance, I ensure every site is visually stunning, functional, and user-friendly. I showcase my coding journey on GitHub, contributing to the vibrant developer community.

Experience

I have had the privilege to work on a variety of projects, from e-commerce platforms to informative websites, utilizing my skills to bring designs to life and deliver exceptional user experiences.
I understand the importance of web performance, accessibility, and SEO, and I ensure that these elements are integral to the sites I develop. My professional journey has been a valuable learning experience, allowing me to collaborate with teams, meet project deadlines, and adapt to new technologies.
I have also had the opportunity to take on website maintenance tasks, enhancing my problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
